meanings.definition: The quality or state of being diverse in character or content.
meanings.sent1: The heterogeneity of the student population made teaching challenging.
meanings.sent2: The heterogeneity of flavors in the ice cream shop delighted customers.
meanings.sent3: The party's playlist had such a heterogeneity of songs that it kept everyone guessing.
meanings.sent4: The city's skyline displayed a heterogeneity of architectural styles.
meanings.sent5: The heterogeneity of colors in the garden created a beautiful mosaic.

meanings.definition: The presence of a variety of elements or components within a group or entity.
meanings.sent1: The heterogeneity of opinions in the meeting led to a lively discussion.
meanings.sent2: The heterogeneity of skills among team members contributed to their success.
meanings.sent3: The jigsaw puzzle's pieces had such a heterogeneity of shapes that it was challenging to complete.
meanings.sent4: The forest exhibited a heterogeneity of trees, each with its own unique characteristics.
meanings.sent5: The heterogeneity of ingredients in the recipe added depth to the dish.
